sources.title: The President's Lady (1953)
sources.description: The story of president Andrew Jackson from his early years, through his meeting with and subsequent marriage to Rachel Donelson Robards. The plot concentrates on the later scandal concerning the legality of their marriage and how they overcame the difficulties. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-presidents-lady-1953/

metadata.Plot: The story of president Andrew Jackson from his early years, the film begins when he meets Rachel Donaldson Robards. The plot concentrates on the scandal concerning the legality of their marriage and how they overcame the difficulties.
metadata.Actors: Susan Hayward, Charlton Heston, John McIntire
